summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Treasurer to cancel the unpaid assessments levied for the improvement of Sand Point Way and other streets and avenues, by Grading, Paving, etc., Local Improvement District No. 5109; and Princeton Avenue, by the construction of a Viaduct, Local Improvement District No. 5178 on portion of the Northwest Quarter of the Southeast Quarter, Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., as hereinafter more fully described.
